sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_attachment ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, md5 char(32) not null, topic varchar(128) not null, attachtype tinyint not null, attachsize bigint not null, videotime int not null, durl varchar(128), fileext varchar(16), downloads int not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );
